description:
The sextuplets continue to enjoy all the advantages of having handy AI around, but things start to go south when the AI start to point out all the flaws their friends have.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bonkura no Jidai / Hyoukachi / Magic Tenshi Magi Hera Icchii
Dimwit Generation / Estimated Value / Magical Angel Magi Lunatic Icchi
ぼんくらの時代 / 評価値 / マジック天使 マジヘラ イッチー
